definitions.definition: To compute the average of, especially the arithmetic mean.
examples: If you average 10, 20 and 24, you get 18.

definitions.definition: Over a period of time or across members of a population, to have or generate a mean value of.
examples: The daily high temperature last month averaged 15°C.
I averaged 75% in my examinations this year.

definitions.definition: To divide among a number, according to a given proportion.
To be, generally or on average.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To compute the average of, especially the arithmetic mean.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) Over a period of time or across members of a population, to have or generate a mean value of.
( transitive ) To divide among a number, according to a given proportion.
( intransitive ) To be, generally or on average.
